title: stegaknows
description: Steganography tool that conceals data within images. Supports both text-in-image and image-in-image embedding for secure data hiding.

title: spectop
description: AI-powered laptop comparison tool that helps users find the perfect laptop based on their needs. Analyzes and compares laptops from Amazon and Flipkart to deliver accurate and personalized recommendations.

title: payd
description: Monorepo fintech platform built with Turborepo, enabling users to manage digital wallets, add funds via on-ramp transactions, and conduct secure payments, with separate Next.js interfaces for users and merchants, including a webhook handler for bank integrations

title: floatingCipboard.nvim
description: A lightweight Neovim plugin to track and browse yank history using a floating window. Built with Lua, designed for multi-tab, multi-pane workflows - even across tmux splits.

title: bit-chess
description: Real-time chess platform for head-to-head matches with instant move updates and synchronized gameplay

title: pursace
description: A web-base crypto wallet application supporting Ethereum and Solana blockchains, allowing users to create and manage wallets

title: nature-of-code-rs
description: Implementing concepts from Daniel Shiffman's Nature of Code using Rust and Macroquad

title: digital-wallet
description: A basic digital wallet application allowing users to sign up, receive a random initial balance, and perform transactions securely

title: dodge
description: An implementation of circle dodger game in rust using macroquad with increasing difficulty

title: flappyish bird
description: An implementation of the infamous flappy bird game in html canvas
